<Text: Thurgood Marshall College (TMC) is one of the six undergraduate colleges at the University of California San Diego.>
Triplets:<Thurgood Marshall College
1:
--------------------
Text: Thurgood Marshall College:  The college, named after Thurgood Marshall, the first African-American Supreme Court Justice and lawyer for the landmark 1954 Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of Education, emphasizes "scholarship, social responsibility and the belief that a liberal arts education must include an understanding of [one's] role in society."
